attr.value: Port. If Rebuild the Town is in play on Achrond, Ivory Hoard is playable here. Cardolanian Whalers may be played at this site.
Port. Cardolanian Whalers may be played at this site.
Drake — 2 strikes with 11 prowess (cannot be cancelled; attacker chooses defending characters).
Hidden site. Tap a ranger to reveal this site for his company. Tap a scout here during the site phase to make the site contain a hoard that turn.
Hidden site. Tap a ranger to reveal this site for his company. Tap a scout here during the site phase to make the site contain a hoard that turn.
Drake — 2 strikes with 11 prowess (cannot be cancelled; attacker chooses defending characters).

(1st) Dark Enchantment (Spell of Cold) — each character faces a strikes with 12 prowess; instead of using prowess against the strike, each character uses his body, modified by +3 if he taps;(2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack a hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Angmar.
A sage may discard a Stolen Knowledge card he controls to force the discard of any one environment card in play.
Dark Enchantment (Spell of Cold) — each character faces a strikes with 12 prowess; instead of using prowess against the strike, each character uses his body, modified by +3 if he taps
A sage at this site may tap to bring an environment card from your discard pile to your play deck (reshuffle); if he is a Ringwraith you may take the card to your hand instead.
Brigands and Thief may always be played at this site.
Brigands and Thief may always be played at this site.

Place a token with this site after a successful flattery, offering, or riddling attempt for your company here. If there is a token placed with the site, when it is discarded you may take a rune item from your sideboard to your hand.

Place a token with this site after a successful flattery, offering, or riddling attempt has cancelled the automatic-attack for your company here. If there is a token placed with the site, when it is discarded you may take a rune item from your sideboard to your hand.
(1st) Traps — 2 strikes with 7 prowess; (2nd) Undead. Dwarf — 1 strike with 10 prowess (attacker chooses defending characters)
Ancient Dwarf-ruin. A Dwarf at this site may tap to search your play deck or discard pile and take one Map to Mithril to hand.
If Gates of Morning is in play, the Merikoirat faction is playable at this site.

When this site would be discarded, you may place it with a wolf ally in the moving compay instead. Target wolf receives +1 to his prowess and body and is considered a unique ally for the purpose of interpreting hazards.
Volcano. Any gold ring stored at this site is automatically tested (modify the roll by -2). If any of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are cancelled.
Volcano. Any creature playable at any Under-deeps site may be played at this site. Non-Nazgûl creatures played at this site attack normally, not as detainment.
Volcano. Any creature normally playable at any Under-deeps site may be played at this site.

w c cc ww c s w
(1st) Traps (Elven Wards) — each character faces a strike with 9 prowess; (2nd) Elves — 3 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against a covert company).

*Any gold ring may be played at this site. Any company moving to this site has its hazard limit increased by 2. Opponent may take Elven Wards from his play deck or discard pile when this site is revealed as a new site. A Ringwraith may not move to this site.
Discard a treasure item from a company at this site to search your discard pile or play deck (reshuffle) and take one prisoner card into your hand.
When you play Token of Goodwill at this site, any treasure item may be discarded as if a greater item.
(1st) Elves — each character faces a strike with 9 prowess (detainment against covert companies); (2nd) Elves — 3 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against covert companies).

An overt company must tap an untapped character (if available) if this site is revealed as its new site. Any company moving to this site has its hazard limit increased by 1. Snow-elves may always be played against an overt company at this site.
This site is considered a Haven [H] for the purposes of healing and playing hazards.
the site never leaves active play and if your opponent is The Witch-king, he must discard his cards face-up.
If Gates of Morning is in play, the automatic-attack receives +2 prowess and this site is considered a Port.
Men — each character faces a strike with 6 prowess (detainment)

If Doors of Night is in play, this site is in West Bay of Forochel. Dwarf, Man, and Umit characters may heal at this site. Aerfaroth faction may be played at this site. After the successful play of a faction at this site you may play from the discard pile one minor item only playable in The Northern Waste.

card.name: Jääkylät
card.text: If Doors of Night is in play this site is in West Bay of Forochel. Dwarf/Man/Umit characters may heal at this site. After successful play of a faction at this site you may play Bone harpoon, Beadmakers Healing Runeknife or Minor Spellbead from discard pile as minor item. Aerfaroth may be played at this site.

attr.value: Men — each character faces a strike with 7 prowess (detainment against a covert company)

If Doors of Night is in play, this site is in West Bay of Forochel. Burning Rick, Cot and Tree, Long Grevious Siege, and Tempest of Fire may not be played on/at this site. *Information resources can only be played by characters with a home site in The Northern Waste in a covert company. Such characters may heal at this site. Tap such a character to place this site with him, instead of removing it from active play. Discard this card from the company to cancel an attack keyed to a Coastal Sea [c] region.
(1st) Wolves — 2 strikes with 7 prowess; (2nd) Orcs — 3 strikes with 8 prowess
any Umit character may play Dark Numbers at this site as though he were a scout.
Orcs — 3 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against overt companies)
The Ice-orcs faction is playable at this site. Non-Nazgûl creatures played at this site attack normally, not as detainment.

Lossoth faction is playable at this site. When a company moves to this site (after cards are drawn), reveal a number of cards from the top of your play deck equal to the number of scouts in the company plus the number of Wilderneses [w] in the company's site path. If you reveal Lossoth, take it into your hand; shuffle the remaining cards back into your play deck.
Men — each character faces a strike with 6 prowess (detainment against a covert company)

If Gates of Morning is in play, the automatic- attack receives +2 prowess, and one character at the site may tap during the site phase to take control of a minor food item, which may be taken from your hand or sideboard.
If Gates of Morning is in play, this site is considered a Free-hold [F] and the Hives faction is playable here by a character with Ligr Wodaize Berne as his home site.
if Gates of Morning is in play, this site is considered a Free-hold [F].
Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to any region in The Northern Waste.
If Eloeklo, Demon of the North Wind is in the company, opponent may take True Spirits of the North Wind from his discard pile or play deck (reshuffle) at the beginning of the movement/hazard phase.
(1st) Orcs — 3 strikes with 7 prowess; (2nd) Men — 2 strikes with 10 prowess (attacker chooses defending characters)
A company leaving this site may move as though Angmar and Anduin Vales were adjacent.

A company leaving this site may move as though Angmar and Anduin Vales were adjacent. During the site phase, a sage at this site may make a body check modified by -1; if he is still in play afterwards, tap the site and bring Morgul-apprentice from your sideboard into play with the sage, rotated twice.
Hoard battle-gear items may be played at this site.
Hoard battle-gear items may be played at this site.

Only non-unique Orc and Troll characters may be brought into play at this site (unless the character has Mornost as his home site). Any gold ring stored at this site is automatically tested (modify the roll by -2). If one of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are cancelled.
(1st) Orcs — 4 strikes with 8 prowess; (2nd) Orcs — 3 strikes with 9 prowess
Creatures played at this site attack normally, not as detainment. While this site is a Ruins & Lairs [R], it contains a hoard.
(1st) Orcs — 4 strikes with 8 prowess; (2nd) Orcs — 3 strikes with 9 prowess
While this site is a Ruins & Lairs [R], it contains a hoard.
Spirits of Ice and Cold — 2 strikes with 7 prowess; —resources which affect Undead also affect these Spirits—
True Spirits of the North Wind may always be played at this site against an overt company.
Spirits of Ice and Cold — 2 strikes with 7 prowess; —resources which affect Undead also affect these Spirits—
any Lost Knowledge or Information resource controlled by an Elf or sage may be stored at this site (as if at a Haven [H]).
Conjure the Tempest may be played at this site (as if at a Ruins & Lairs [R]. Non-Nazgûl creatures played at this site attack normally, not as detainment.
A More or Less Decent Giant is playable at this site (as if at a site in a mountain region).
Men — each character faces a strike with 6 prowess (detainment against a covert company)
Port. If Doors of Night is in play, this site is also considered a Ruins & Lairs [R] for the purpose of playing hazards.
Port. If Doors of Night is in play, this site is also considered a Ruins & Lairs [R] for the purpose of playing hazards.
Umli Traders faction is playable at this site, if you discard (for no other effect) an item from the company; any influence check against this faction at this site is modified by +2.
The Losrandir and Lossoth factions are playable at this site.
Men — each character faces a strike with 7 prowess (detainment against a covert company)
If Fell Winter is in play, the automatic-attack receives -2 prowess, and the Wargs of the Forochel faction is playable at this site.
Hollow by the Left Breast may be played at this site, regardless of the character's race.
Animals (Death Shrews) — 7 strikes with 4 prowess; the body check of any character wounded by this attack is modified by +2

If you eliminate a character or Prisoner from the company and play Freeze the Flesh, instead of an eliminated character you may take Bone Dragon from your discard pile and play it as an ally with the shadow-magic user (tap site if untapped).
Kala Dulakurth (0), The Rusted-deeps (8), The Wind-deeps (5)

Non-Nazgûl creatures played at this site attack normally, not as detainment.
Eithel Morgoth (0), Ancient Maze (6), The Iron-deeps (6), The Pits of Angband (8)

Eithel Morgoth (0), Ancient Maze (6), The Iron-deeps (5), The Pits of Angband (7)
Any gold ring stored at this site is automatically tested (modify the roll by -2). If one of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are cancelled.
Eithel Morgoth (0), Ancient Maze (6), The Iron-deeps (5), The Pits of Angband (7)

Any non-unique Drake not keyable to a Coastal Sea [ c] region may be played at this site. Non-Nazgûl creatures played at this site attack normally, not as detainment.
Contains a hoard. *Only playable if the company has either faced an attack keyed to this site this turn, or discards (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card it controls.

Contains a hoard. When a company moves to this site, opponent may search his discard pile or play deck (reshuffle) for an Elven Wards and take it into his hand. This site is considered an Elf-hold for the purpose of Elven Wards.
(1st) Undead — 3 strikes with 9 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Coastal Seas [c]

Hidden site. Unless moving with starter movement, the company must discard from hand a Belegaer or Great Ship to move to this site. Contains a hoard. The hazard player may play any number of Dragon's Curse from his discard pile on characters leaving this site.
(1st) Undead — 3 strikes with 9 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Coastal Seas [c]

Hidden site. An overt company must tap two untapped characters (if available) when this site is revealed as its new site. Contains a hoard. Any Dragon's Curse played on a character at or moving to/from this site does not count against the hazard limit.
(1st) Undead — 3 strikes with 9 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Coastal Seas [c]

Hidden site. Unless moving with starter movement, the company must discard from hand a Belegaer or Great Ship to move to this site. Contains a hoard. The hazard player may play any number of Dragon's Curse from his discard pile on characters leaving this site.
Men — 4 strikes with 7 prowess (detainment against a covert company)
A ranger at this site may tap to searchyour discard pile or play deck (reshuffle) for a Skis and Fur-coats and place it with his company.
Umli — each character faces a strike with 9 prowess (detainment against a covert company)
If Smoke on the Wind is played at this site, opponent must remove one Profitable Trade he has in play with a faction playable at a site in The Northern Waste.
If you have successfully influenced Umli Traders at this site, you may tap a character here to take an Umit character from your discard pile or play deck (reshuffle) to your hand.
